data.name: Vanguard Princess
data.detailed_description:
Prepaid Debit Cards



Carry your favorite Vanguard Princess design with you! eigoMANGA partnered with CARD.com to launch a collection of prepaid Visa® cards. Sign up today!

Account Features:

  • Get paid up to 2 days faster with Direct Deposit
  • Use it everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted
  • Mobile check deposit
  • Convenient mobile app
  • Surcharge-free MoneyPass® ATMs
  • Real-time text alerts

Your Choice Of Designs:

















About the Game



Government experiments on a young girl triggered a cosmic shock wave that gifted many young girls with mystical powers. She re-emerges into the world and vows to destroy all of mankind in an act of revenge. A brave group of girls who embraced their powers heads to the battlefield to confront her; not just for the sake of the world, but to pursue their own personal motives and dreams.

  • Choose from ten girls with unique fighting skills and pair them with a powerful partner to form an unstoppable team.
  • Navigate the adventures of a Vanguard Princess in the Story Mode or engage in head-to-head battles in the Versus Mode.

http://store.steampowered.com/app/857390/
http://store.steampowered.com/app/329150/
http://store.steampowered.com/app/406440/

data.short_description: Vanguard Princess is a classic 2D fighting game that features an all-female cast each with its own unique fighting style. Choose from ten girls and pair them with a powerful partner to form an unstoppable team. Navigate their journeies in Story Mode or engage in head-to-head battles in Versus Mode.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 8.1, 8, 7, XP, 2000
  • Processor: Pentium III 400MHz, 128MB RAM
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 32MB Video RAM
  • Storage: 470 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: DirectPlay must be installed for Windows 10 PCs

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.8 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 840 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 4-button game controller (Optional)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 / SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 4-button game controller (Optional)
